title: Steamed Salmon with Courgetti

ingredients.content: 1 lemon, zest finely grated, then cut in 8 slices
4 fresh salmon fillets, boneless (approx. 140 g each)

preparations.content: Place water in mixing bowl and heat <b>8 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Meanwhile, place salmon fillets in Varoma dish and season with 2 pinches salt and 2 pinches pepper. Place 2 slices lemon on each salmon fillet.

Once water has heated, place covered Varoma dish into position then steam <b>8 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Meanwhile,  prepare courgetti using a spiralizer (see tip) and transfer to Varoma tray. Season courgetti with 2 pinches salt, 2 pinches pepper and stir through grated lemon zest.
Insert Varoma tray with reserved seasoned courgetti and steam for a further <b>3 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Serve immediately with a drizzle of olive oil over courgetti if desired.

hintsAndTricks: If you don't have a spiralizer, use a julienne peeler or peel courgette into ribbons with a standard peeler and slice thinly lengthways.
Test that the salmon is fully cooked before serving.

For a 'help yourself' family meal, once the salmon and courgetti are cooked, break the salmon up and stir into the courgetti in a large serving bowl adding a drizzle of oil. You could also add some paprika, to taste, if desired.
